Element.name: Variable
Element.Description: A variable can be defined on top-level pages and on master pages. A variable has page scope.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The name that is used in the Activation Expressions specification. The name must respect the Java code conventions because it identifies the variable name in the condition scripts.

The type of the value to be assigned to the variable before the activation expression evaluation. Admissible types are:
  • String
  • Integer
  • Decimal
  • Float
  • Date
  • Time
  • Timestamp
  • Boolean
  • Blob
If the selected type is empty, no conversion is performed on the variable's value.

A component of the page which the variable is based on. If defined the variable is a component-based variable. The Browse button opens the . It permits to choose the component which the component is based on.
An output parameter of the selected component.
